scaleHigFreq.description: high freq denoise strength, higer value stronger noise reduction.

scaleMidFreq.description: mid freq denoise strength, higer value stronger noise reduction.

scaleLowFreq.description: low freq denoise strength, higer value stronger noise reduction.

bayerSharpenEnable.description: 1 - enable bayer sharpen. 0 - disable bayer sharpen.

filterStrength.description: denoise strength, which scales the noise profile lut.

sharpnessThr.description: if the frame whose sharpness is less than the certain amount of the reference frame will not be used for multi-frame denoise.

maxNotUsedFrame.description: specifies the maximum frames which will not be used when their frame sharpness are not satisfied.

blendRatio.description: blending factor between original pixel and denoised pixel. Lower value = softer image, Higher value = more noisy image.

faceHighBlendRatio.description: high freq blending factor between original pixel and denoised pixel in face area. Lower value = softer image, Higher value = more noisy image.

faceMiddleLowBlendRatio.description: middle low freq blending factor between original pixel and denoised pixel in face area. Lower value = softer image, Higher value = more noisy image.

grainAdderRatio.description: controls the amount of grain added to the image. Lower value = less grain, Higher value = more grain.

darkControl.description: controls the denoise strength of the dark region. Lower value = weak noise reduction, Higher value = stronger noise reduction.

higFreqSimilarityThr.description: high freq similarity threshold, higer value stronger noise reduction.

midFreqSimilarityThr.description: mid freq similarity threshold, higer value stronger noise reduction.

lowFreqSimilarityThr.description: low freq similarity threshold, higer value stronger noise reduction.

filterStrength.description: denoise strength, which scales the noise profile lut.

sharpnessThr.description: if the frame whose sharpness is greater than the certain amount of the reference frame will be used for multi-frame denoise.

maxNotUsedFrame.description: specifies the maximum frames which will not be used when their frame sharpness are not satisfied.
